description.value: Gain +10 to Deceive tests whilst being questioned, to resist someone using the Initimidate Skill, and to Willpower when resisting Interrogation or mind reading effects (if a psychic power, combines with outer resistance talents).

system.benefit: Gain +10 to Deceive tests whilst being questioned, to resist someone using the Initimidate Skill, and to Willpower when resisting Interrogation or mind reading effects (if a psychic power, combines with outer resistance talents).

prerequisites.text: Tyrantine Shadow Agent Alternative Advance, 100xp, Int 30.

characteristics.condition: When resisting interrogation, torture, or mind-reading
